## Raw reads summary table (RNA-seq, DNA-seq, ChIP-seq, ATAC-seq)
* This section of the report should contain a table containing a summary of the initial FastQC run.
```{r, include=FALSE}

basic_stats_input_directory <- ('/Users/jwalla12/Repositories/fastqc_outputs/')
multi_qc_directory <- ('/Users/jwalla12/Repositories/fastqc_outputs/multiqc_data/')
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
### Basic Stats ###
basic_stats_func<- function(input_directory){
  file_list <- list.files(path=basic_stats_input_directory, pattern='fastqc_data.txt', recursive=TRUE, full.names=TRUE)
  entire_qc_files <- lapply(file_list, function(x) read.table(x, fill = TRUE, header = FALSE, sep = '\t', col.names = c('V1', 'V2', 'V3', 'V4', 'V5', 'V6', 'V7'), comment.char = '&', stringsAsFactors = FALSE))
#basic stats
  basic_statistics <- lapply(entire_qc_files, function(x) (df_rows <- slice(x, (which(x$V1=='>>Basic Statistics')+4):which(x$V1=='>>Per base sequence quality')-2) %>% select(-c('V3','V4','V5','V6','V7')) %>% rename(Measure=V1, Value=V2)))
  column_1 <- basic_statistics[[1]]$Measure
  basic_statistics_table <- bind_cols(basic_statistics) %>% select(-contains('Measure'))
  basic_statistics_table$Measure <- column_1
  basic_statistics_table <- basic_statistics_table[ , order(names(basic_statistics_table))]
  basic_statistics_table_md <- kable(basic_statistics_table, format='markdown')
  return(basic_statistics_table_md)
}
```

```{r}
basic_stats_func(basic_stats_input_directory)
```

## Per base quality plot (RNA-seq, DNA-seq, ChIP-seq, ATAC-seq)
```{r, include=FALSE}
### Per base quality ###
per_base_quality_func <- function(multi_qc_directory){
per_base_quality <- read.table((paste0(multi_qc_directory,'mqc_fastqc_per_base_sequence_quality_plot_1.txt')), header=TRUE, sep='\t')
per_base_quality_tidy <- gather(per_base_quality, position, phred_score, -Sample) 
per_base_quality_tidy$position <- gsub('X','', per_base_quality_tidy$position)
per_base_quality_tidy$position <- sapply(per_base_quality_tidy$position, as.numeric)
per_base_quality_plot <- plot_ly(data = per_base_quality_tidy,
                                 x = ~position,
                                 y = ~phred_score,
                                 type = 'scatter',
                                 mode = 'lines',
                                 text = ~Sample,
                                 hoverinfo = 'text',
                                 hovertext = paste('Sample:', per_base_quality_tidy$Sample))
return(per_base_quality_plot)
}
```

```{r}
per_base_quality_func(multi_qc_directory)
```


## Per base N-percentage plot (RNA-seq, DNA-seq, ChIP-seq, ATAC-seq)
```{r, include=FALSE}
### Per base quality ###
per_base_n_content_func <- function(multi_qc_directory){
per_base_n_content <- read.table((paste0(multi_qc_directory,'mqc_fastqc_per_base_n_content_plot_1.txt')), header=TRUE, sep='\t')

per_base_n_content_tidy <- gather(per_base_n_content, position, percent_N, -Sample)

per_base_n_content_tidy$position <- gsub('X','', per_base_n_content_tidy$position)

per_base_n_content_tidy$position <- sapply(per_base_n_content_tidy$position, as.numeric)
per_base_n_content_plot <- plot_ly(data = per_base_n_content_tidy,
                                 x = ~position,
                                 y = ~percent_N,
                                 type = 'scatter',
                                 mode = 'lines',
                                 text = ~Sample,
                                 hoverinfo = 'text',
                                 hovertext = paste('Sample:', per_base_n_content_tidy$Sample)) %>% layout(yaxis=list(range=c(0,100)))
return(per_base_n_content_plot)
}
```

```{r}
per_base_n_content_func(multi_qc_directory)
```



## Adapter content plot (RNA-seq, DNA-seq, ChIP-seq, ATAC-seq)
```{r, include=FALSE}
### Per base quality ###
adapter_content_func <- function(multi_qc_directory){
adapter_content <- read.table((paste0(multi_qc_directory,'mqc_fastqc_adapter_content_plot_1.txt')), header=TRUE, sep='\t')

adapter_content_tidy <- gather(adapter_content, position, percent_of_sequences, -Sample)
adapter_content_tidy$position <- gsub('X','', adapter_content_tidy$position)
adapter_content_tidy$position <- sapply(adapter_content_tidy$position, as.numeric)
adapter_content_plot <- plot_ly(data = adapter_content_tidy,
                                 x = ~position,
                                 y = ~percent_of_sequences,
                                 type = 'scatter',
                                 mode = 'lines',
                                 text = ~Sample,
                                 hoverinfo = 'text',
                                 hovertext = paste('Sample:', adapter_content_tidy$Sample)) %>% layout(yaxis=list(range=c(0,100)))
return(adapter_content_plot)
}
```

```{r}
adapter_content_func(multi_qc_directory)
```
